name: Summit Hotel
description:
PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE RUNNING THE GAME

We recommend downloading Windows version below because web version is a bit broken (no fancy particles and some lag spikes :<)

CLICK THE GAME WINDOW AFTER RUN THE GAME SO IT CAN CAPTURE YOUR INPUT

This is summit hotel. You have to build hotels for the humans that come

You lose if a human reaches the bottom of the screen (they will go down if no hotels are available)

PRESS S to use MONEY to build an HOTEL

Arrow keys to choose where to place the hotel. Press two directions at once to move diagonally. Press A or D to move between hotels already built

PRESS W to collect MONEY from HOTELS

Press both A + D keys to BUILD a REPAIR FACILITY. This will repair your hotels

Hotels cost 100$

Repair facilities cost 200$

Welcome to Summit Hotel!

This is the first time me and my brother make a game together. We only had one day for doing this... but we hope you like it!
